name: devcoll-microservices
description: DevColl Social Network Microservices with NestJS, Prisma, PostgreSQL, MongoDB
author: DevColl Team

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../auth-service && npm install && cd ../user-service && npm install && cd ../post-service && npm install && cd ../media-service && npm install && cd ../search-service && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:gateway && npm run build:auth && npm run build:user && npm run build:post && npm run build:media && npm run build:search
scripts.prisma:generate: cd apps/auth-service && npx prisma generate && cd ../user-service && npx prisma generate && cd ../post-service && npx prisma generate
scripts.prisma:migrate: npm run prisma:migrate:auth && npm run prisma:migrate:user && npm run prisma:migrate:post
scripts.prisma:migrate:auth: cd apps/auth-service && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:migrate:user: cd apps/user-service && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:migrate:post: cd apps/post-service && npx prisma migrate dev
